taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family asteraceae;tribe heliantheae;subtribe gaillardiinae;genus hymenoxys;species ambigens;variety neomexicana

bio:treatment.description: Plants 30–40+ cm. Heads 35–100+. Phyllaries: outer 5, basally connate 2/3–3/4 their lengths, 4–4.5 mm, apices obtuse to acuminate to acute; inner 5, 2.5–3 mm, apices rounded to obtuse to weakly acute or mucronate. Ray florets 4–5; corollas 3.4–4.2 × 1.7–2.2 mm. Disc florets 8–15. Cypselae 1.7–2.3 mm, hairs moderately wavy; pappi usually of 2–4 scales 1.2–2 mm, sometimes 0 on disc florets.
bio:treatment.discussion: Variety neomexicana is known from the Animas and Peloncillo mountains.
